class.name: NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData2D
class.brief_description: Container for parsed source geometry data used in navigation mesh baking.
class.description: Container for parsed source geometry data used in navigation mesh baking.

method.name: add_obstruction_outline
method.description: Adds the outline points of a shape as obstructed area.

method.name: add_projected_obstruction
method.description: Adds a projected obstruction shape to the source geometry. If [param carve] is [code]true[/code] the carved shape will not be affected by additional offsets (e.g. agent radius) of the navigation mesh baking process.

method.name: add_traversable_outline
method.description: Adds the outline points of a shape as traversable area.

method.name: append_obstruction_outlines
method.description: Appends another array of [param obstruction_outlines] at the end of the existing obstruction outlines array.

method.name: append_traversable_outlines
method.description: Appends another array of [param traversable_outlines] at the end of the existing traversable outlines array.

method.name: get_bounds
method.description: Returns an axis-aligned bounding box that covers all the stored geometry data. The bounds are calculated when calling this function with the result cached until further geometry changes are made.

method.name: get_obstruction_outlines
method.description: Returns all the obstructed area outlines arrays.

method.name: get_projected_obstructions
method.description: Returns the projected obstructions as an [Array] of dictionaries. Each [Dictionary] contains the following entries: - [code]vertices[/code] - A [PackedFloat32Array] that defines the outline points of the projected shape. - [code]carve[/code] - A [bool] that defines how the projected shape affects the navigation mesh baking. If [code]true[/code] the projected shape will not be affected by addition offsets, e.g. agent radius.

method.name: get_traversable_outlines
method.description: Returns all the traversable area outlines arrays.

method.name: has_data
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] when parsed source geometry data exists.

method.name: merge
method.description: Adds the geometry data of another [NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData2D] to the navigation mesh baking data.

method.name: set_obstruction_outlines
method.description: Sets all the obstructed area outlines arrays.

method.name: set_projected_obstructions
method.description: Sets the projected obstructions with an Array of Dictionaries with the following key value pairs: [codeblocks] [gdscript] "vertices" : PackedFloat32Array "carve" : bool [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: set_traversable_outlines
method.description: Sets all the traversable area outlines arrays.
